ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string of the MongoDB database to connect to.

DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the MongoDB health check is disabled or not.

DisableTracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is disabled or not.

HealthCheckTimeout.description: Gets or sets a integer value that indicates the MongoDB health check timeout in milliseconds.

Driver.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting to a MongoDB database using MongoDB driver.

Parameters.description: .NET Aspire parameter configuration. A parameter's value will be retrieved from the property with the same name.
